messages.content: It will remain my aim to always put Ceredigion first and to serve everyone irrespective of party politics. Please remember that if ever I can be of service to you in any way, then you should not hesitate to get in touch.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aiming for fair taxation, taking hard-pressed families out of the tax regime altogether.
Start the process of scrapping tuition fees.
A real commitment to renewable energy that works and to energy conservation measures.
Help for senior citizens by restoring the link of pensions to earnings.
And we need real reform to clean up politics.

mentions.tacticalSituation: My majority was just 219 last time. So please make sure that your vote counts this time.

issues.environment: We need a real commitment to renewable energy that works and to energy conservation measures.
issues.governance: And we need real reform to clean up politics.
